0: sabnzbd, sabnzbd.media, sabnzbd.media.svc, sabnzbd.media.svc.cluster, sabnzbd.media.svc.cluster.local, sabnzbd.${SECRET_DOMAIN}

/hr/traefik.github.io-charts-traefik.title: traefik helm release
/hr/traefik.github.io-charts-traefik.name: traefik
/hr/traefik.github.io-charts-traefik.doc: Traefik is a HTTP reverse proxy and load balancer for microservices. It integrates with popular orchestration systems, such as Kubernetes, to provide seamless and automatic service discovery, load balancing, and proxying for your applications. Traefik is designed to be fast, efficient, and easy to use, making it a good solution for home lab environments. With Traefik, you can expose your applications to the internet with ease, providing remote access to your services from anywhere. Whether you're looking to host a personal website, run a web-based service, or simply provide external access to your applications.

1:
mqtt:
  host: emqx.home.svc.cluster.local
  username: "${SECRET_DOUBLE_TAKE_MQTT_USER}"
  password: "${SECRET_DOUBLE_TAKE_MQTT_PASSWORD}"

frigate:
  url: http://frigate.home.svc.cluster.local:5000
  cameras:
    - amcrest-frontyard
    - amcrest-pool
    - amcrest-turret
    - amcrest-office

  zones:
    - camera: amcrest-frontyard
      zone: outside
    - camera: amcrest-pool
      zone: outside
    - camera: amcrest-turret
      zone: familyroom
    - camera: amcrest-office
      zone: office

  events:

detect:
  match:
    save: true
  unknown:
    save: true

detectors:
  deepstack:
    enabled: true
    url: "http://deepstack.home.svc.cluster.local:5000"
  compreface:
    enabled: false

time:
  timezone: America/New_York

notify:

0: host=crtsh-postgres port=5432 dbname=certwatch user=certwatch password=certwatch sslmode=disable
1: host=crtsh-postgres port=5432 dbname=certwatch user=certwatch password=certwatch sslmode=disable

0:
# Default DB connection settings
# conninfo to be supplied via the "-conninfo" command-line parameter.
connopen = 2
connidle = 2
connlife = "10m"

# Default workload settings
interval = "30s"
batch = 20
concurrent = 2

# Other default settings
httptimeout = "30s"
1:
# Default DB connection settings
# conninfo to be supplied via the "-conninfo" command-line parameter.
connopen = 2
connidle = 2
connlife = "10m"

# Default workload settings

# Other default settings

0: host=crtsh-postgres port=5432 dbname=certwatch user=certwatch password=certwatch sslmode=disable
1: host=crtsh-postgres port=5432 dbname=certwatch user=certwatch password=certwatch sslmode=disable

0:
# Default DB connection settings
# conninfo to be supplied via the "-conninfo" command-line parameter.
connopen = 2
connidle = 2
connlife = "10m"

# Default workload settings
interval = "30s"
batch = 500
concurrent = 50
